div.span: Mediapolis Community, Today, Governor Kim Reynolds announced that all schools in Iowa will remain closed through the end of the school year to help prevent the further spread of COVID-19. I know this ...

p.span:
The staff at Mediapolis Elementary misses each and every student. We can not wait to see you soon. Thank you to the elementary staff for submitting photos and to Miss. Kennedy for creating this video.
www.youtube.com/watch?v=2KXvQqIlz3s&feature=youtu.be

Mediapolis Community School will be providing meals to any child living in our community or attending our school district ages 2 - 18 on Tuesday and Friday of each week at four area locations from 11:00 AM - 12:00 PM (Noon). Each meal bag will contain breakfast and lunch for multiple days for each child.
The deadline for requesting meals will be noon on Monday for Tuesday pickup and noon on Thursday for Friday pickup.
When picking up meals, please stay in your vehicle to help us meet CDC social distancing recommendations.
forms.gle/ASNma5mgXZHn1AfHA

p.span: A Quick Video Update from Superintendent Greg Ray on Mediapolis' Continuous Learning Plan Starting the Week of April 13, 2020.

div.span: We understand that there are many questions surrounding the school and school events during the COVID-19 school closure. The information found below is assuming that school will be back in session on ...

p.span:
Remember to sign up for meals next week by Monday (4/6) at noon!
Tuesday will be the ONLY pickup day next week due to our observation of Good Friday as a holiday. We will be providing meals for 5 days in Tuesday's pickup.
Our regular Tuesday and Friday pickup schedule will resume the week of April 13.
Have a happy and safe Easter!
forms.gle/t1rpC4CBgFhYXMTcA

div.span: Mediapolis Community School will be providing meals to any child living in our community or attending our school district ages 0 - 18 on Tuesday and Friday of each week at four area locations from 11:...

p.span:
News Release – 4-2-2020
This afternoon, Governor Reynolds extended the closure of Iowa schools through April 30, 2020.
This closure continues to affect all school programming including all activities as well as extra-curricular practices and competitions.
Next week the administrative team will be developing a new educational plan for students in an effort to provide better continuous educational services. We will also be working with the Iowa Department of Education for approval of the Mediapolis Continuous Learning Plan.
Look for more information detailing the Mediapolis Continuous Learning Plan late next week.

Remember to submit your meal requests for pickup on Friday 4/3/20 by noon Thursday 4/2/20.
forms.gle/jq7H9y9myXpkEJk99
